channel.title: Mopar Scape 2x xp rate
channel.description:
We should have 2x xp rate instead of 4x, to make the game harder, challenging, more satisfaction, and more like original rsc
This will make it [b]harder[/b] to level up, and when [b]staking[/b] comes along, not that many people will make new stakers if their stats suck, because it would be [b]"hard" to level up[/b], so you got different staking variations. Like the [b]original RSC[/b].
Make this game more of a challenge, and quality won't be absent like prosperity.
2x is the way to go, if you want more like the original RSC feel, 4x seems a bit too much, who cares if it takes a long time to level up, its all apart of the game making it "challenging" and funner.
Other servers had [b]high xp rates[/b], I could make a staker [b]in a day[/b], that's [b]no fun[/b] because its not like the original feel of RSC. let this server be different.
Mopar Scape Classic is suppose to be a replica of RSC, 2x xp rate would be the way to go if you want a more "Quality" game.
[b]Results:[/b] Harder to level up, less making new stakers if your stats suck, more staker variations, more satisfaction in game by completing something thats hard, more appreciative of your stats, more like RSC feel, and less high level characters, etc...

A. not only to you but to everyone else on the topic of RSCE, this post isn’t about RSCE.
B. That’s because you’ve deleted billions of GP and hundreds of rares, just because some people are actually good at the game and can accumulate a bit over time.

item.title: Mopar Scape 2x xp rate
item.dc:creator: @Yoshie Yoshie
item.description:
@Yoshie wrote:

[quote=“ip0wns, post:13, topic:394704”]and why you don’t play RSCEmulator?
There are 99% servers have huge xp rate…
Why would you complain?

If you guys like 4x exp then go play RSCE.[/quote]
It’s up to 4x that 4x now I believe.

Honestly, 1x or 2x seems quite low, but doable in the end. 4x is fast without being ridiculously fast. 4x seems like it would be just fast enough to keep people interested in the server, waiting for their next level, etc.? Also, didn’t they already vote on this, providing the options 2x, 3x, and 4x all in the same poll?

item.title: Mopar Scape 2x xp rate
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

I agree in the aspect of making it “worthwhile” to stake and the items you stake… RSCE was like that at 1 point… Then the bots came and i was able to make 30 - 60 million gp a day with my 10 thievers going at it something rotten! then when i staked… didn’t feel like it did before the botting.

The level variation on the origianl staking was great also, when high level staking you would go off HP levels and not combat levels. I support anything from 2 - 5x. There pretty damn low. I mean, yeah I’d love to have old rsc rates back but! We don’t have enough people to constantly play to make it satisfactory and entertaining so you’ve always got to give in and but the exp raes slightly higher. Since rsc is dieing you got to bring in different types of rsc players.

But even with 2 - 5x exp rates nobodys going to have more than 2 stakers, even 2 would take a hell of a long time to make.

All in all I agree.

Read full topic
